title: Essential items will be provided without shortage for festive season
content: Minister of Finance Basil Rajapaksa states that he is ready to provide essential items to the people without any shortage during the upcoming festive season. This was emphasized at a committee appointed by the President this afternoon (11) regarding the supply of essential items. It was revealed at the meeting that despite the shortage of milk powder, gas, wheat flour and cement, there are sufficient stocks of all other essential commodities.
